The Homecoming of Beorhtnoth Beorhthelm's Son (recording)

wikitext.*:
This page attempts to chronologically list audio recordings (both non-video and video) of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]], such as interviews and film documentaries.

*''Note: Dates refer to when the actual recording was made.''

*[[1930]] - '''''[[Linguaphone Conversational Course]]'''''
*[[1952]] - '''[[1952 tape recording]]'''
*[[1954]] - '''''[[The Homecoming of Beorhtnoth Beorhthelm's Son (recording)]]'''''
*[[1957]] - '''[[1957 "Carnival of Books" Interview]]
*[[1958]] - '''[["Hobbit Dinner" in Rotterdam]]
*[[1964]] - '''[[1964 BBC Interview]]'''
*[[1965]] - '''[[1965 BBC Interview]]'''
*[[1965]] - ''[[An Interview with J.R.R.T.]]''
*[[1967]] - ''[[Poems and Songs of Middle Earth]]'', Caedmon TC 1231 
*[[1968]] - '''''[[Tolkien in Oxford]]'''''
